attributes.action: LPG introduction Public transport and trade schools
attributes.additional_details:
This is a challenge project where as early school leavers are also involved and Enviererment issue is the main key public transport should be the main issue to switch on LPG diesel Mix.this will be the factor of millions of Diesel fuel saving also new technology where education dep.can  be involved in trade school for this system and reducing Co2 emission the EU challenge project.more cash flow and less subsidy from the energy dep.budget where EU grants can also be introduced such as Tax deduction to encourage transport companies to involve there annual expence.more jobs and clean air and less annual road tax.this is not a wish but giving something to the country without Burocracy from different selfish  MP opinions
Carmel Brincau
Malta
